phrases.original: For access to this app, please register by completing the form below.
phrases.translated: For access to this app, please register by completing the form below.

phrases.original: Where can I find my authorization code?
phrases.translated: Where can I find my authorization code?

phrases.original: If you received a message inviting you to register, an authorization code is found at the bottom of that message.
phrases.translated: If you received a message inviting you to register, an authorization code is found at the bottom of that message.

phrases.original: I do not have an authorization code
phrases.translated: I do not have an authorization code

phrases.original: This message is for ${fullname}. In order to complete your registration, please click on the link below:
phrases.translated: This message is for ${fullname}. In order to complete your registration, please click on the link below:

phrases.original: If you do not have an authorization code, check the checkbox below.
phrases.translated: If you do not have an authorization code, check the checkbox below.

phrases.original: The authorizaton code must be numeric.
phrases.translated: The authorizaton code must be numeric.

phrases.original: The authorizaton code must be 6 digits long.
phrases.translated: The authorizaton code must be 6 digits long.

phrases.original: City of your ICC church is required
phrases.translated: City of your ICC church is required

phrases.original: Please check your e-mail address for accuracy.
phrases.translated: Please check your e-mail address for accuracy.

phrases.original: There was a glitch preventing your registration from being processed.  Please wait a moment then try again.
phrases.translated: There was a glitch preventing your registration from being processed.  Please wait a moment then try again.

phrases.original: Please revise your password.  For your protection, we require that it must have a minimum level of unpredictability in order to prevent potential hackers from guessing it.
phrases.translated: Please revise your password.  For your protection, we require that it must have a minimum level of unpredictability in order to prevent potential hackers from guessing it.

phrases.original: A minimum length of 8 characters is required.  Using a phrase (rather than a single word) is encouraged, because phrases are less predictable.
phrases.translated: A minimum length of 8 characters is required.  Using a phrase (rather than a single word) is encouraged, because phrases are less predictable.

phrases.original: Please check your e-mail.  We have sent you a message containing a special link. In order to confirm your registration, you must click on that link.
phrases.translated: Please check your e-mail.  We have sent you a message containing a special link. In order to confirm your registration, you must click on that link.

changes.original: you must click on that link.
changes.translated: you must click on that link.

phrases.original: Waiting too long? Remember to check in your spam folder.
phrases.translated: Waiting too long? Remember to check in your spam folder.

phrases.original: Before registering, you should install this Web app by adding it to your home screen. Installation will put the following icon on your device, enabling you to open the app quickly and conveniently:
phrases.translated: Before registering, you should install this Web app by adding it to your home screen. Installation will put the following icon on your device, enabling you to open the app quickly and conveniently:

changes.original: adding it to your home screen
changes.translated: adding it to your home screen

phrases.original: Installation will also unlock certain important functionality that this app provides, such as the ability to notify you when someone who you invited views their invite.
phrases.translated: Installation will also unlock certain important functionality that this app provides, such as the ability to notify you when someone who you invited views their invite.

phrases.original: To proceed with installation, click on the button below:
phrases.translated: To proceed with installation, click on the button below:

phrases.original: Now that you have installed, you will find the following icon on your device's home screen:
phrases.translated: Now that you have installed, you will find the following icon on your device's home screen:

phrases.original: From now on, just open the app from your home screen by clicking on this icon (instead of using your Web browser).
phrases.translated: From now on, just open the app from your home screen by clicking on this icon (instead of using your Web browser).

phrases.original: In order to continue with Registration, please do the following:
phrases.translated: In order to continue with Registration, please do the following:

phrases.original: Open the app from your home screen
phrases.translated: Open the app from your home screen
